title: Colorado National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Saddlehorn Visitor Center        Colorado National Monument is open 24 hours a day, seven days a week (closed December 25)  Visitor Center hours: summer hours 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. For updates on storm or temporary closures call the park hotline at (970) 858-3617 ext 402.      The bookstore is operated by the Colorado National Monument Association. Saddlehorn Campground is open year round.
